name: dom_craft
description: A lightweight, declarative DOM builder for vanilla JavaScript.

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'release' && git push && npm run version:patch

author: mooky1007
